ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Some of them will come up to others and they will question one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will ask each other questions,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will turn to one another and ask (regarding the past events).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will turn to one another ask questions,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And one of them turned towards the other, questioning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And some of them draw near to others, questioning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And some of them shall advance towards others questioning each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They advance one upon another, asking each other questions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And some of them draw near unto others, questioning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will converse with one another, putting questions to each other,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they will advance Unto each other asking questions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will turn to one another, questioning each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will advance to each other, engaging in mutual enquiry.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And some of them draw near to others, questioning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They will go to one another asking each other questions:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they will approach one another, inquiring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:25] And some among them will turn to one another, questioning each other — they ask one another about how they were in the past and what they have now attained, in their delight and acknowledgement of the grace [of God to them].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And some of them draw near unto others) upon visiting, (questioning) talking about the life of the world,
